verses.text: \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w Sanballat|strong="H5571"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* builded \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w wroth|strong="H2734"\w*, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w took|strong="H5927"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* indignation, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* mocked \w the|strong="H8085"\w* Jews.

\w And|strong="H3389"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* spake before \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brethren \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H3389"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Samaria, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* said, \w What|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* feeble Jews? \w will|strong="H3389"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* fortify \w themselves|strong="H6213"\w*? \w will|strong="H3389"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H6213"\w*? \w will|strong="H3389"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* end \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* day? \w will|strong="H3389"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* revive \w the|strong="H3605"\w* stones \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heaps \w of|strong="H3605"\w* rubbish, seeing \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* burned?

\w Now|strong="H5921"\w* Tobiah \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Ammonite \w was|strong="H6440"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3119"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* said, \w Even|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H5975"\w* \w which|strong="H4929"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* build, if \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fox go \w up|strong="H5975"\w*, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* break \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* stone wall.

Hear, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* our \w God|strong="H3808"\w*; \w for|strong="H1129"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3782"\w* despised: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* turn back \w their|strong="H3808"\w* reproach \w upon|strong="H3063"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* own head, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w give|strong="H7235"\w* \w them|strong="H1129"\w* \w up|strong="H1129"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* spoiling \w in|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \w of|strong="H2346"\w* captivity:

\w and|strong="H7200"\w* cover \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* iniquity, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* sin \w be|strong="H3808"\w* blotted \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w thee|strong="H7200"\w*: \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* provoked \add thee \add*\w to|strong="H5704"\w* anger \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* builders.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* built \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wall; \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wall \w was|strong="H1961"\w* joined \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* half \add the height \add*\w thereof|strong="H3427"\w*: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mind \w to|strong="H7725"\w* work.

\w But|strong="H5971"\w* \w it|strong="H5975"\w* \w came|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w pass|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w*, \w when|strong="H5975"\w* Sanballat, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* Tobiah, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* Arabians, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* Ammonites, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* Ashdodites, heard \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* repairing \w of|strong="H2346"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H2346"\w* Jerusalem \w went|strong="H5971"\w* forward, \add and \add*\w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* breaches began \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* \w stopped|strong="H5975"\w*, \w then|strong="H5975"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* very wroth;

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* conspired \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* Jerusalem, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w cause|strong="H5971"\w* confusion therein.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* prayer \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w set|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w watch|strong="H3045"\w* \w against|strong="H8085"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* day \w and|strong="H7725"\w* night, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H2346"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* said, \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w strength|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bearers \w of|strong="H1004"\w* burdens \w is|strong="H1931"\w* decayed, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w much|strong="H6213"\w* rubbish; \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* able \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w build|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wall.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H6213"\w* adversaries said, \w They|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* know, neither see, till \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H2346"\w* \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* slay \w them|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w cause|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* cease.

\w And|strong="H2719"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* came \w to|strong="H5921"\w* pass \w that|strong="H2719"\w*, \w when|strong="H8628"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Jews \w which|strong="H2719"\w* dwelt \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* came, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* said unto \w us|strong="H5921"\w* ten times \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* places, \w Ye|strong="H1129"\w* must return unto \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H5921"\w* set \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* lowest \w parts|strong="H6504"\w* \w of|strong="H2346"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w space|strong="H7350"\w* \w behind|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* open places, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w even|strong="H5921"\w* set \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* families \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* swords, \w their|strong="H5921"\w* spears, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* bows.

\w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w I|strong="H8085"\w* looked, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6908"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w unto|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* nobles, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* rulers, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* rest \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H6908"\w*, \w Be|strong="H6963"\w* \w not|strong="H8085"\w* \w ye|strong="H8085"\w* afraid \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w*: remember \w the|strong="H8085"\w* Lord, \w which|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H4725"\w* great \w and|strong="H6963"\w* terrible, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w for|strong="H4725"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* brethren, \w your|strong="H8085"\w* sons \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* daughters, \w your|strong="H8085"\w* wives \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* houses.

\w And|strong="H2388"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w pass|strong="H6213"\w*, \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w our|strong="H3318"\w* enemies heard \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H4399"\w* \w known|strong="H3318"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H2388"\w* God \w had|strong="H4399"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w their|strong="H2388"\w* counsel \w to|strong="H5704"\w* nought, \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w returned|strong="H5927"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w of|strong="H3318"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* wall, \w every|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w forth|strong="H6256"\w*, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w half|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* wrought \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w half|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w them|strong="H8432"\w* \w held|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* spears, \w the|strong="H8432"\w* shields, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* bows, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* coats \w of|strong="H3117"\w* mail; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* rulers \w were|strong="H1961"\w* behind \w all|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* house \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Judah.

They \w that|strong="H5288"\w* builded \w the|strong="H6584"\w* wall \w and|strong="H5288"\w* they \w that|strong="H5288"\w* \w bare|strong="H5288"\w* burdens laded themselves, every one \w with|strong="H4325"\w* one \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w his|strong="H6584"\w* hands wrought \w in|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H6584"\w* work, \w and|strong="H5288"\w* \w with|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H6584"\w* other held \w his|strong="H6584"\w* \w weapon|strong="H7973"\w*;
and the builders, every one had his sword girded by his side, and so builded. And he that sounded the trumpet was by me.
And I said unto the nobles, and to the rulers and to the rest of the people, The work is great and large, and \w we|strong="H3068"\w* are separated upon the wall, one far from another:
in what place soever ye hear the sound of the trumpet, resort ye thither unto us; our God shall fight for us.
So \w we|strong="H3068"\w* wrought in the work: and half of them held the spears from the rising of the morning till the stars appeared.
Likewise at the same time said I unto the people, Let every one with his servant lodge within Jerusalem, that in the night they may be \w a|strong="H3068"\w* guard to us, and may labour in the day.
So neither I, nor my brethren, nor my servants, nor the men of the guard which followed me, none of us put off our clothes, every one \add went with \add*his weapon \add to \add*the water.
